name: Yql-gplus
tagline: YQL and Yahoo Pipes to get Google Plus RSS
body:
Google Plus RSS feed from YQL and Yahoo Pipes ============================================== * Go to Yahoo Pipes and execute the pipe with your Google Plus user: [http://pipes.yahoo.com/pipes/pipe.info?_id=fe86a86d950536686b2ad99ed515887f](http://pipes.yahoo.com/pipes/pipe.info?_id=fe86a86d950536686b2ad99ed515887f)

* [YQL Console test query](http://developer.yahoo.com/yql/console/#h=use+%22https%3A%2F%2Frawgithub.com%2Fdavidayalas%2Fyql-gplus%2Fmaster%2Fyql-gp.xml%22+as+gp%3B+SELECT+*+FROM+gp+WHERE+user%3D%22%2Bdavidayalas%22+and+linkToPost%3D1)

* You can use a Google Apps Script to cache the query and use it to put your posts in your page. [Example](https://github.com/davidayalas/davidayalas.github.com/blob/master/gas-scripts/gplus-cache.js)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
